description: Linked RQG requisition groupers for EHI Export.

columns.name: MSG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the in basket message record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RQG_GROUPER_ID
columns.description: The list of requisition groupers (RQG) that this EOW is associated with for Electronic Health Information (EHI) Export
